sentences.sentence_en: The exquisite craftsmanship of the handmade jewelry took my breath away.

sentences.sentence_en: The CEO's opulent office was decorated with original artwork and antique furniture.

sentences.sentence_en: The opulent resort offered spa treatments and private beach access.

sentences.sentence_en: The job offer was alluring, with great benefits and opportunities for growth.

sentences.sentence_en: The startup's alluring business model attracted many investors.

sentences.sentence_en: The gaudy decorations at the office party were a bit too much for my taste.

sentences.sentence_en: The marketing team avoided gaudy designs that might alienate sophisticated customers.

sentences.sentence_en: His gaudy workout gear made him look like he was trying too hard.

sentences.sentence_en: We passed on the gaudy vacation rental and chose a simpler, more tasteful option.

sentences.sentence_en: The company's tacky promotional materials made a bad first impression on clients.

sentences.sentence_en: I thought the resort looked tacky in the photos, but it was worse in person.

sentences.sentence_en: Wearing flashy designer logos can sometimes look tacky rather than stylish.

sentences.sentence_en: The gym's tacky motivational posters felt outdated and uninspiring.

sentences.sentence_en: The souvenir shop was full of kitsch items like plastic Eiffel Towers.

sentences.sentence_en: Some people love kitsch home decor while others find it tasteless.

sentences.sentence_en: The marketing campaign intentionally used kitsch elements to appeal to nostalgia.

sentences.sentence_en: My grandmother's kitsch collection of porcelain figurines brings back childhood memories.
sentences.sentence_ko: 할머니의 키치한 도자기 인형 컬렉션은 어린 시절 추억을 떠오르게 한다.

sentences.sentence_en: The office was decorated with kitsch motivational posters from the 90s.

sentences.sentence_en: What some consider kitsch, others view as charming folk art.

sentences.sentence_en: The garish neon signs made the shopping district look chaotic at night.

sentences.sentence_en: The marketing team toned down the garish colors to appeal to older consumers.

sentences.sentence_en: We avoided the garish tourist traps and found authentic local restaurants.

sentences.sentence_en: The garish workout equipment at the new gym was a bit overwhelming.
sentences.sentence_ko: 새 헬스장의 번쩍거리는 운동기구가 좀 부담스러웠다.

sentences.sentence_en: Her garish makeup choices were criticized during the beauty class.

sentences.sentence_en: The hotel looked dowdy compared to what was shown in the marketing photos.

sentences.sentence_en: My mother refused to wear anything she considered dowdy or unfashionable.

sentences.sentence_en: The office dress code was so strict that everyone looked dowdy and uninspired.

sentences.sentence_en: The university library felt dowdy with its old furniture and poor lighting.

sentences.sentence_en: He felt frumpy in his old suit compared to his stylish colleagues.

sentences.sentence_en: The vacation photos made me realize how frumpy my travel clothes looked.

sentences.sentence_en: The marketing team updated the brand image from frumpy to fresh and modern.

sentences.sentence_en: Regular exercise helped her feel less frumpy and more confident about her appearance.

sentences.sentence_en: The office walls were painted a drab gray that made everyone feel tired.

sentences.sentence_en: After the drab winter months, the family vacation was a welcome change.

sentences.sentence_en: The marketing team was tasked with making the drab product packaging more appealing.
sentences.sentence_ko: 마케팅 팀은 밋밋한 제품 포장을 더 매력적으로 만드는 임무를 맡았다.

sentences.sentence_en: Her drab workout routine needed some excitement to keep her motivated.

sentences.sentence_en: The university campus looked drab until spring flowers started blooming.
sentences.sentence_ko: 봄꽃이 피기 전까지 대학 캠퍼스는 생기 없어 보였다.

sentences.sentence_en: We tried to liven up the drab hotel room with fresh flowers and music.

sentences.sentence_en: She invested in a timeless wardrobe that would last for years.

sentences.sentence_en: The marketing campaign aimed for a timeless appeal rather than trendy gimmicks.

sentences.sentence_en: My grandmother's timeless advice about family has guided me through life.

sentences.sentence_en: The classic literature course introduced us to timeless works of art.

sentences.sentence_en: Yoga is a timeless exercise that benefits both body and mind.
sentences.sentence_ko: 요가는 몸과 마음 모두에 좋은 시대를 초월한 운동이다.

sentences.sentence_en: The company's headquarters featured timeless architecture that impressed all visitors.
sentences.sentence_ko: 회사 본사는 모든 방문객에게 감동을 주는 클래식한 건축 양식을 자랑했다.

sentences.sentence_en: Her graceful handling of the crisis earned her a promotion at work.
